## Installation
The package can be installed from CRAN as follows:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# Install from CRAN
install.packages('EvaluateCore', dependencies=TRUE)
```

The development version can be installed from github as follows:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# Install development version from Github
devtools::install_github("aravind-j/EvaluateCore")
```

## CRAN checks

```{r, echo = FALSE}
pkgname <- "EvaluateCore"

osdf <-
  rbind(data.frame(OS = "Linux", 
           Flavour = c("r-devel-linux-x86_64-debian-clang",
                       "r-devel-linux-x86_64-debian-gcc", 
                       "r-devel-linux-x86_64-fedora-clang",
                       "r-devel-linux-x86_64-fedora-gcc", 
                       "r-patched-linux-x86_64",
                       "r-release-linux-x86_64")),
data.frame(OS = "Solaris", 
           Flavour = c("r-patched-solaris-x86")),
data.frame(OS = "Windows", 
           Flavour = c("r-devel-windows-ix86+x86_64", 
                       "r-release-windows-ix86+x86_64",
                       "r-oldrel-windows-ix86+x86_64")),
data.frame(OS = "macOS", 
           Flavour = c("r-release-macos-x86_64", 
                       "r-oldrel-macos-x86_64")))

chkurl <- paste("https://cran.r-project.org/web/checks/check_results_",
                pkgname, ".html", sep = "")
if (RCurl::url.exists(chkurl)) {
  chklink <- paste("(", chkurl,  ")", sep = "")
} else {
  chklink <- "(https://cran.r-project.org/web/checks/check_results_j.aravind_at_icar.gov.in.html)"
}

osdf$`CRAN check` <- paste("[![CRAN check - ", osdf$Flavour, "]",
                           "(https://cranchecks.info/badges/flavor/",
                           osdf$Flavour, "/", pkgname, ")]",
                           chklink,
                           sep = "")
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, results='asis'}
library(kableExtra, warn.conflicts = FALSE)

kosdf <- kbl(osdf[, c("Flavour", "CRAN check")], row.names = FALSE)

kosdf2 <- kable_styling(kosdf, bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"),
              full_width = F, position = "left")

pack_rows(kosdf2, index = c("[![Linux](https://shields.io/badge/Linux--9cf?logo=Linux&style=social)](https://cran.r-project.org/web/checks/check_results_EvaluateCore.html)" = 6,
                            "[![Solaris](https://shields.io/badge/Solaris--9cf?logo=Oracle&style=social)](https://cran.r-project.org/web/checks/check_results_EvaluateCore.html)" = 1,
                            "[![Windows](https://shields.io/badge/Windows--9cf?logo=Windows&style=social)](https://cran.r-project.org/web/checks/check_results_EvaluateCore.html)" = 3,
                            "[![MacOS](https://shields.io/badge/MacOS--9cf?logo=Apple&style=social)](https://cran.r-project.org/web/checks/check_results_EvaluateCore.html)" = 2))

```
